title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5315.15 - Online monitoring and control system
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5315.15 - Online monitoring and control system

State Regulations
A gaming facility licensee shall have an online
monitoring and control system connected to each slot machine in such gaming
facility to record and monitor such slot machine's activities. The system shall
be accessible by the commission or the commission's designee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5315.15

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
